00076 STDMETHODIMP CProbeSetMultiDataCopyNumberDataCOM::GetMetric(int index, VARIANT* pVal)
00077 {
00078     ParameterNameValueType &nv = data.metrics[index];
00079         switch (nv.GetParameterType())
00080         {
00081                 case ParameterNameValueType::Int8Type:
00082                         pVal->vt = VT_I4;
00083             pVal->lVal = (int)nv.GetValueInt8();

00094                         break;

00099                         break;

00102             pVal->vt = VT_I4;
00103                         pVal->lVal = (int)nv.GetValueInt32();
00104                         break;
00105 
00106                 case ParameterNameValueType::UInt32Type:
00107             pVal->vt = VT_I4;
00108                         pVal->lVal = nv.GetValueUInt32();
00109                         break;
00110 
00111                 case ParameterNameValueType::FloatType:
00112             pVal->vt = VT_R4;
00113                         pVal->fltVal = nv.GetValueFloat();
00114                         break;
00115 
00116                 case ParameterNameValueType::AsciiType:
00117             pVal->vt = VT_BSTR;
00118                         pVal->bstrVal = COMStringUtils::ConvertString(nv.GetValueAscii());
00119                         break;
00120 
00121                 case ParameterNameValueType::TextType:
